title: Drag show at Nevada Air Force Base canceled by Pentagon
description: A previously approved drag show to be held at Nellis AFB has been canceled by the Pentagon

title: Baseball legend Steve Garvey considering US Senate bid in California, energizing beleaguered GOP
description: Republicans haven't won a U.S. Senate race in heavily Democratic California since 1988

title: Technical issues cause delays for Spirit, Air Canada
description: Spirit Airlines and Air Canada are dealing with technical issues on Thursday that have delayed some of the airlines’ flights

title: New footprints revive hope in Colombia of finding four children missing in jungle
description: The discovery this week of small footprints in a southern jungle-clad area of Colombia has rekindled hope of finding alive four children who survived a small plane crash and went missing a month ago

title: Indianapolis man gets 30 years for fatal 2020 shooting of mail carrier
description: Prosecutors say an Indianapolis man who pleaded guilty to fatally shooting a U.S. Postal Service mail carrier has been sentenced to 30 years in federal prison

title: Child accidentally kills another child with father's gun
description: An Illinois child was shot dead by another child in an accidental shooting. The handgun used in the incident belonged to the father of the killed child, police said.

title: Billy Joel to end Madison Square Garden residency in 2024
description: Billy Joel announced that he is ending his monthly residency at Madison Square Garden in 2024 with his 150th lifetime concert at the venue.

title: Search suspended for man who fell from Carnival cruise ship
description: The U.S. Coast Guard has suspended its search for a Virginia man who fell from a cruise ship balcony earlier this week.

title: Apartment collapse: Human error, IT glitch led to permit incorrectly marked as 'fail'
description: A structural engineer was hired to inspect The Davenport earlier this year, following various complaints from residents.

title: US sanctions Iranians over alleged assassination plots of former US officials, dissidents
description: The United States has announced sanctions against some Iranian and Turkish people and firms accused of plotting to assassinate former U.S. government officials, dual U.S. and Iranian nationals, and dissidents

title: Authorities in western Mexico find 45 bags with human remains
description: Authorities in northern Mexican have found 45 bags containing human remans in a gorge on the outskirts of Guadalajara and were still trying to determine how many bodies were there

title: WATCH:  Rescued sea lions return to the ocean after recovery
description: Two rescued sea lions were successfully released back into the wild after weeks of recovery from injuries.

title: NATO presses Turkey to approve Sweden's membership, eyes Ukraine security plan as summit looms
description: NATO is ramping up pressure on member nation Turkey to drop its objections to Sweden's membership

title: FDA warns consumers not to use off-brand versions of Ozempic, Wegovy
description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration is warning consumers not to use versions of the popular weight-loss drug used in Ozempic and Wegovy and sold online because they might not contain the same ingredients as prescription products and may not be safe o...

title: Japan police say flaws in basic security allowed attacker to throw pipe bomb at prime minister
description: Japan’s National Police Agency says flaws in basic security such as an absence of metal detectors and bag checks allowed an attacker to enter a campaign crowd unnoticed and throw a pipe bomb at Prime Minister Fumio Kishida in April

title: US applications for unemployment benefits tick up slightly as labor market remains healthy
description: The number of Americans filing for unemployment benefits rose slightly last week but remains at healthy levels that continue to show a strong U.S. labor market

title: WATCH:  Drone captures 2nd shark sighting at Alabama beach
description: A shark was spotted swimming in the shallow waters of Orange Beach, Alabama, meters away from a person in the water.

title: New Zealand police file murder charges against man accused of starting hostel fire
description: New Zealand police have filed five murder charges against the man they say lit a deadly fire at a Wellington hostel two weeks ago

title: Europe sees inflation drop to 6.1%, but real relief for consumers will take months
description: Europe is getting a break on inflation

title: Investigators say damaged ties caused German derailment that killed 5
description: Investigators say a train derailment a year ago in the German Alps that left five people dead was caused primarily by damaged concrete ties on the track

title: Coast Guard suspends search for Carnival Magic passenger who went overboard
description: The U.S. Coast Guard has suspended the search for a 35-year-old man who was reported missing from a Carnival cruise ship off of Florida’s Atlantic Coast

title: WATCH:  Tourist’s near-miss with Yellowstone bison caught on camera
description: A woman had a close call when she tried to touch a wild bison while posing for a photo at Yellowstone National Park.

title: Scuffles in German cities after student who attacked neo-Nazis is convicted
description: Sympathizers of a young woman given a lengthy prison sentence for participating in attacks on neo-Nazis and other right-wing extremists have held protests and scuffled with police in some German cities

title: Thousands to march in Jerusalem Pride parade, first under right-wing gov't ever
description: Thousands of people are expected to take part in Jerusalem’s Pride parade

title: The debt ceiling drama shifts to the Senate. Here's what to expect
description: The goal is to pass the deal by late Friday, lawamker aides said.

title: Feds have recording of Trump acknowledging he held onto sensitive document: Sources
description: Investigators have obtained a 2021 audio recording of former President Trump acknowledging he held onto a sensitive military document after leaving office, sources say.

title: Debt ceiling deal passes the House as US moves closer to preventing historic default
description: The House passed a debt ceiling bill on Wednesday while cutting government spending over the next two years, in a victory for both Biden and Kevin McCarthy

title: Judge dismisses criminal charges against California energy company in 2020 fatal wildfire
description: A California judge has dismissed all charges against Pacific Gas & Electric for its role in a 2020 fatal wildfire that destroyed hundreds of homes and killed four people

title: 85-year-old man, passerby help save sleeping family from house fire
description: A father and his four children were saved from an early morning house fire by a neighbor and a passerby who saw smoke coming from the home's garage, police said.
